name: Bravo Sample: Like Button
description:
Made for Bravo Studio.


Add like buttons to engage apps users with your Bravo app.

This sample Figma file includes layers named with Bravo Tags, containers, and other essential setup. 🤓


To see the final result, go to Bravo Studio > Sample Apps section and duplicate this app. The duplicated app will include a connected and functional API collection from an Airtable. 🚀


Learn more about setting up like buttons and stateful components in the Bravo Studio help center.


Check out Bravo Studio 👏

www.bravostudio.app
